brewery.brewery_description: Our VALE beers are designed to be flavoursome and sessionable, with or without food, in a glass or from the bottle. Our recommendation is to give them a swirl and drink from a big, tulip-shaped glass, with a great meal, in excellent company.

beer.beer_description: An easy drinking and balanced Pale Ale. Brewed perfectly to allow for all the juicy hop flavours to shine through with a melody of yellow tropical and summer stone fruits. This is the beer to reward yourself for mowing the lawn, making it through to Friday, or just because you are thirsty.

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 400 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 81.

beer.beer_description: An Australian Pale Ale with a refreshing balance of malt, hops and yeast characters. Hop Additions of Amarillo and Cascade give a wonderful fresh crisp finish with lingering flavours of citrus, passionfruit and peaches. The hop flavours and aromas are matched beautifully with the sweet honey finish from crystal malt.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 220 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 45! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 380 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 77!

items.checkin_comment: Crisp Lager by Vale Brewing a easy drinker of a lager at 4.2% abv clean malty & citrusy dry finish very crushable cheers 🍻

items.badge_description: Not your dad's lifeless, fizzy suds of yore, American, American Light, and American Amber lagers today are complex craft beers perfect for the beach, pool, or backyard? AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS

beer.beer_description: An easy drinking and balanced Pale Ale. Brewed perfectly to allow for all the juicy hop flavours to shine through with a melody of yellow tropical and summer stone fruits. This is the beer to reward yourself for mowing the lawn, making it through to Friday, or just because you are thirsty.

An easy drinking and balanced Pale Ale. Brewed perfectly to allow for all the juicy hop flavours to shine through with a melody of yellow tropical and summer stone fruits. This is the beer to reward yourself for mowing the lawn, making it through to Friday, or just because you are thirsty.

An Australian interpretation of an American IPA, using a combination of hops from three countries. Galaxy from Australia, Nelson Sauvin from New Zealand and Citra from United States. Malt flavours are derived from the combination of pale, wheat and crystal. Very hop forward showing strong pine and citrus notes, with stone fruit and passionfruit characters. The malt structure is beautifully matched with the dry hopping, giving this beer a refined balance.

An Australian Pale Ale with a refreshing balance of malt, hops and yeast characters. Hop Additions of Amarillo and Cascade give a wonderful fresh crisp finish with lingering flavours of citrus, passionfruit and peaches. The hop flavours and aromas are matched beautifully with the sweet honey finish from crystal malt.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

beer.beer_description: An Australian interpretation of an American IPA, using a combination of hops from three countries. Galaxy from Australia, Nelson Sauvin from New Zealand and Citra from United States. Malt flavours are derived from the combination of pale, wheat and crystal. Very hop forward showing strong pine and citrus notes, with stone fruit and passionfruit characters. The malt structure is beautifully matched with the dry hopping, giving this beer a refined balance.

items.badge_description: You've just tried one of three available styles from Style Hunt - Ale Trail!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 150 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 31! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Galaxy from Australia, Nelson Sauvin from New Zealand and Citra from United States. Malt flavours are derived from the combination of pale, wheat and crystal. Very hop forward showing strong pine and citrus notes, with stone fruit and passionfruit characters. The malt structure is beautifully matched with the dry hopping, giving this beer a refined balance.

Hop Additions of Amarillo and Cascade give a wonderful fresh crisp finish with lingering flavours of citrus, passionfruit and peaches. The hop flavours and aromas are matched beautifully with the sweet honey finish from crystal malt.
Gilbert st hotel very own lager.

items.badge_description: Hair of the dog? You know how to start the day off right. Have at least 5 brews before noon.
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 200 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 41.

beer.beer_description: An Australian interpretation of an American IPA, using a combination of hops from three countries. Galaxy from Australia, Nelson Sauvin from New Zealand and Citra from United States. Malt flavours are derived from the combination of pale, wheat and crystal. Very hop forward showing strong pine and citrus notes, with stone fruit and passionfruit characters. The malt structure is beautifully matched with the dry hopping, giving this beer a refined balance.

An Australian Pale Ale with a refreshing balance of malt, hops and yeast characters. Hop Additions of Amarillo and Cascade give a wonderful fresh crisp finish with lingering flavours of citrus, passionfruit and peaches. The hop flavours and aromas are matched beautifully with the sweet honey finish from crystal malt.

This is our interpretation of what a new world craft lager should be. Approachable, sessionable, balanced and flavoursome. This beer is filtered for smooth and refreshing crispness with medium carbonation. The 100% malted grain profile is a combination of pilsner, carapils and light munich, whilst the hop bill includes the noble German hop Tettnang, Australian Helga and NZ Pacifica. The sweet malt characters are balanced by the earthy spice and fresh citrus kick and floral notes derived from the hops.

An easy drinking and balanced Pale Ale. Brewed perfectly to allow for all the juicy hop flavours to shine through with a melody of yellow tropical and summer stone fruits. This is the beer to reward yourself for mowing the lawn, making it through to Friday, or just because you are thirsty.

Designed using Pale, Munich, Crystal and Carafa roasted malt. A filtered beer with brilliant clarity, dark brown in colour with ruby and garnet highlights. It has a strong malt backbone with hints of coffee, chocolate and cocoa that balance the use of the Falconer’s Flight hops, giving rise to citrus, pine and vanilla flavours and aromas. The combination of dark malt and hops with lager yeast delivering a crisp, clean dark beer.

Mid Coast Bright Ale reflects the stunning coastline where Vale Brewing is located. Australian Cascade and Victoria Secret hops headline this bill for the signature crisp, fresh and fruity flavour. Aromas of fresh citrus paired with the biscuity malt characters blend for the perfect tribute to summer.

A balanced Sour Ale, with the addition of 23rd Street Distillery Signature Gin. Creating an array of botanical flavours flowing through the prominent tropical hop flavours. This is the perfect palate cleanser for any occasion.
Crisp German Pilsner.  All German malt and hops. Available in keg and can

Brewed with El Toro Tequila, triple sec, lime juice and salt. Hopped with Amarillo and Mosaic.
This Margarita Sour fills the palate with citrus forward flavours, balanced with salt and authentic Mexican Tequila bringing a Mexican twist to the Vale range.
A twist on our flagship IPA, using all Australian Hops. This IPA provides rounded bitterness and an abundance of citrus notes.
Tropic Ale goes hazy. A combination of stone fruit & mango passionfruit hop flavours, balanced by a bit of hazy bitterness for a juicy refreshing pale.
Gilbert st hotel very own lager.

** Limited Edition **
The perfect perk up; with 5 shots of coffee to the pint, this Porter sure packs a punch! Perfect blend of Roasted Malts finished off with Lactose for sweetness. 50-hour infusion on freshly ground coffee beans brings delightful chicory and dark cacao notes on the palate, followed by a caffeine kick to get you through the day.

Named after the Haitian god of agriculture, the Azacca hop is the hero in our version of the American Pale Ale.

Soft citrus and stone fruit aromas balance finely with the mild, crisp pine notes.

The smooth malt profile is balanced by the refined
length of bitterness derived from the four different
Azacca hop additions, including a generous dry hop.

What to do when your mates over at Pomegranates Australia want to collaborate? You find a way to use them in a beer!

We’ve teamed up with Pomegranates Australia to craft a traditional sour ale that delivers zinging tartness and a subtle sweetness.

From farm to can – it’s an absolute winner!

Our New Zealand Hazy Pale Ale. With mouthwatering bangs of tropical, citrus & stone fruit thanks to an all-Kiwi hop line-up featuring the newest, coolest hops on the block – Superdelic and Nectaron! Let the glacial freshness of this hop-tastic brew transport you to the purest of New Zealand alpine streams. May your tastebuds dance with joy.

The secret is out! The newest beer release from the Vale Taphouse is an old one. First brewed in Dusseldorf Germany in the 1800s this amber style is a malty smooth delight. Toasted notes on the nose with a medium hop bitterness balanced with a nutty-malt sweetness this Sticke Altbier is clean mellow easy drinking.

A cloudy, traditional-style cider made in collaboration with McLaren Vale’s Chapel Hill Winery.

Head Brewer Jeff Wright has elected to use a combination of locally grown apples to create a crisp yet full flavour. Pink Ladies, Granny Smiths, Golden Delicious and Fuji fruit, all from the surrounding Adelaide Hills and Fleurieu Peninsula regions.

“We wanted to create an apple cider that actually tastes like apples – it might sound obvious, but there are a lot of options on the market that don’t properly show that characteristic!”

A lager with a brilliant clarity. Amber red in colour with garnet highlights, its backbone is strong in maltiness from the use of Munich malts which portray rich, toasted characters that balance the modern hops used in this beer. Aromas of citrus and pine rise to compliment the flavour delivering a crisp clean finish.

It’s peak California Gold Rush in the 1800’s. Funny guys Ekhardt and Johannes thought they’d get on the brew. But with only lager yeast and no such thing as fridges, they had to improvise…. SO it goes, Steam Beer was born and it became so loved it was California’s most common beer. Think Lager/Ale hybrid baby! Woody, toasty, earthy, caramel. Moderate Malt with a hop kick. Just how we like it. This is our Modern Cali Common.
